abstract: Rep Dan Kildee, outspoken advocate for prisoner Amir Hekmati and other Americans held or missing in Iran, has decided to vote in favor of Iran nuclear accord; his assessment of deal is important because debate in Congress over whether to support it has become entangled with prisoner issue.
lead_paragraph: Dan Kildee’s assessment of the deal is important because the debate in Congress over whether to support it has become entangled with the prisoner issue.

headline.main: Congressman for Family of Iran Prisoner, Amir Hekmati, Backs Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: Congressman for Iran Prisoner’s Family Backs Accord

snippet: Dan Kildee’s assessment of the deal is important because the debate in Congress over whether to support it has become entangled with the prisoner issue.
